comments.author: Arnold Schilham, UMCU
comments.creator: generate_config_json.py version 20180219

params.OCR_Detector:prefix: text in box starts with this and this should be stripped
params.OCR_Detector:type: result should be interpreted as variable of this type
params.OCR_Integral:suffix: text in box ends with this and this should be stripped
params.OCR_Integral:type: result should be interpreted as variable of this type
params.OCR_Label:type: result should be interpreted as variable of this type
params.channel: which channel to take for multi-channel data; either an integer or 'avg', or 'rgb' (avg)
params.slicenr: which slice to analyse if enhanced dicom is used (-1)

usage: "OCR_xxx:prefix": "mm" # text in bounding box of OCR_xxx starts with this and this should be stripped
"OCR_xxx:suffix": "mm" # text in bounding box of OCR_xxx ends with this and this should be stripped
